title.rendered: Bluetooth Headset V5.0, Single Ear Hook Bluetooth Earpiece, Wireless Earphone for Business Driving Sports, HD Mic…

content.rendered:
Colour Name:RD02-Black

On Sale!!!

M20 Bluetooth 5.0 Headset Hands-free Wireless Earpiece for Business/Office/Driving/Running/Workout/Gym and so forth.

Bluetooth Pairing Steps:

1. Press the facility button for 3s, purple and blue gentle flash alternately, the wi-fi headset enters pairing mode.
2. Turn on the Bluetooth in your cellphone or different units, search and discover “Bluetooth”.
3. Select “Bluetooth”, the bluetooth earphone will auto pair with the cellphone, the earphone flashes blue.
4. After paired, you’ll be able to change the Bluetooth title.

Main Features:

Bluetooth 5.0, quick pairing
Long battery life, 10 hours play/name time
Built-in double microphone, CVC 6.0 Noise cancelling, clear name
180° rotating, left/proper ear sporting
Easy operation, quantity management
Lightweight, ergonomic design, earhook design, painless sporting
IPX5 waterproof/sweatproof
Compatible with most bluetooth enabled units, together with cell telephones, tablets, laptops and so forth.

Product Parameters:

Product Model: M20
Bluetooth Version: V5.0
Wireless Range: 33 toes (no blocking)
Charging Time: 1.5 – 2 hours
Charging Port: Micro USB
Play/Talking time: 10-12 hours
Charging Voltage: DC5V
Working Voltage: 3.7V
Material: ABS

Package Lists:

1 * Bluetooth Headset
1 * USB Charging Cable
1 * User handbook
2 * Ear caps

Make certain this suits by getting into your mannequin quantity.
【Bluetooth 5.0 Chip】- M20 Bluetooth headset adopts newest bluetooth 5.0 chip, quick pairing, secure sign transmission, low energy consumption and 33 toes wi-fi vary. CVC 6.0 noise cancelling expertise allows clear sound, mixed with built-in microphone, you’ll be able to take/reply calls and redail the final name.
【Long Battery Life】- M20 Bluetooth earpiece built-in 220mAh rechargeable polymer lithium battery, offers 8-10 hours music play/name on a single cost. And the earphone is quick charged totally in 1.5 hours.
【Easy Operation】- Long press the facility button for 3s to activate/off, as soon as click on to play/pause/reply/grasp up, lengthy press for 2s to reject name, double click on to redail the final name; Click as soon as the “+”/”-” to modify earlier/subsequent music, lengthy press the “+”/”-” to regulate quantity.
【Left/Right Ear Wearing】- The Bluetooth earbud might be 180° rotated, match for each left and proper ear sporting, the earhook design and TPE smooth materials make no ache to the ears, appropriate for long-time sporting, reminiscent of sleeping, strolling and dealing and so forth. IPX5 waterproof/sweatproof withstands sweaty train within the fitness center.
【Universal Compatibility】- The Bluetooth headphone is appropriate with most Bluetooth enabled units, together with cell telephones, tablets, and laptops. It may also connect with 2 units on the identical time.
